changeSet.author: Keerthi
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Microbiology Results form

changeSet.author: Keerthi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Staphylococcus aureus. MRSA','Providencia sp.', 'Providencia rettregrei','Shewanella sp.', 'Shewanella algae','Staphylococcus chromogenes', 'Staphylococcus intermedius','Streptococcus constellatus', 'Streptococcus oralis','Streptococcus milleri', 'Streptococcus mitis','Streptococcus salivarius', 'Aeromonas Sp.') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Microbiology, Final Identification");

changeSet.comment: Adding answers for Microbiology, Final Identification

changeSet.author: Keerthi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("CNS, Doxycycline", "CNS, Linezolid", "SS, Doxycycline", "SS, Linezolid", "ES, Linezolid", "AXD, Piperacillin/Tazobactam", "AXD, Trimethoprim/Sulfamethoxazole", "SA, Doxycycline", "SA, Linezolid", "SAM, Cefoxitin", "SAM, Mupirocin", "ASP, Cefepime", "ASP, Ceftazidime", "ASP, Aztreonam", "ASP, Ciprofloxacin", "ASP, Levofloxacin", "ASP, Trimethoprim/Sulfamethoxazole", "SP, Doxycycline", "SP, Linezolid") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Bacteriology, Final Identification");

changeSet.comment: Adding antibiograms to Bacteriology, Final identification

changeSet.author: Keerthi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Susceptible","Resistant","Intermediate") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CNS, Doxycycline");
